text: [Music]
greetings my name is matt wood and i'm
here at the aws headquarters in seattle
to give you an update on elastic
beanstalk elastic beanstalk deploys your
app plus the instances load balancers
and monitoring needed to run it all
automatically
when a new platform update becomes
available for your application say an
update to the java runtime elastic
beanstalk will now automatically update
your entire stack this happens in a
three-step process first of all elastic
beanstalk spins up a new instance with
the new update and tests to make sure
that the app is operating as expected
then it spins up an equivalent set of
instances as your app is already running
on runs the tests again and then only
when it's safe it swaps the load
balancer over to point of the new
updated application you can specify the
maintenance window for both major and
minor updates and you'll get
notifications when this occurs that's
managed updates for elastic beanstalk
available now thanks a lot
[Music]
